dialogues.text: Apollo's corner is in turmoil... The Champion is definite hurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Assistant)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get that doctor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No doctor!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're hurtin', man!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No doctor!... I'm feelin' good, bro!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In Rocky's corner, things are frantic.  His eyes are swol shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanna keep goin'?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would you keep goin'?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No more, ya wanna lose an eye? No more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open my eyes -- Please, open my eyes! Mickey nods to Benny.  He secretly places a small ring kn between his index and middle finger.  In one smooth movem he drags the razor over the blood welts and quickly cover the draining wounds with gauze... It is done so quickly n one is ever aware of the operation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the rear of the arena Adrian looks transfixed at the r She is caught up in the heat of the battle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BELL RINGS for round fourteen.  Rocky bores in close, but Apollo still has spring in his legs.  He seems determ to end it this round... Apollo catches Rocky flush on the jaw.  Rocky is staggered.  Like a wolf, Apollo cuts loose with pure savagery.  Rocky is driven against the ropes an receives a devastating beating from the Champion... Rocky dropped. Rocky sits stunned in the middle of the ring... Everythin is a distortion.  He looks for familiar faces as though t ask for help... Mickey and Mike scream frantically for hi to stay down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Six -- Seven -- Eight -- Rocky gets to his feet and tenses with renewed energy.  H is like a wounded wild animal.  The tide suddenly turns. Rocky drops low and catches Apollo with a pair of terrifi body punches that seem to drive Apollo's diaphragm up to throat... A CRACK is HEARD.  A glaze of pain covers Apoll eyes.  It is only a supreme effort that keeps the Champio upright... Apollo is badly hurt.  He is bent over. Rocky moves towards Apollo.  Apollo flicks dread jabs int Rocky's eyes... The Italian wades in with punches that se to bulge out Apollo's back.  Creed takes the punishment l a stoic. Blood is running from Apollo's mouth.  In the clinch he leans over Rocky and it drips down the Italian's neck and shoulders.  Apollo shields his wound from the ringside judges and continues to fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BELL RINGS.  Apollo's men rush out and guide him to h corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Ribs broke -- Blood trickles from the corner of Apollo's mouth.  The Trainer feels the ribs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yo' bleedin' inside, man -- Get that doctor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One more round.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't kill yourself, man -- Let the doctor stop the fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Stop jivin'!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cover the ribs -- Look here, elbow down, tight -- Tight -- stand straight -- you're the best, you're the best!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocky no longer resembles himself... His face has complet been beaten to jelly, but his mood is buoyant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How I look out there, Mick?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (truly worried)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great, kid, great. The ring Doctor leans over Rocky and checks the eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One more round -- How do you feel? Rocky is approaching the supreme moment of his life.  He cannot be bothered with pain or doctors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine -- Go away, I'm gonna make it -- I'm gonna make it! Everyone is distraught over Rocky's dangerous condition.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We gotta stop it, kid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ya gave it ya best shot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody's gonna say ya didn't give ya all.  I can't let ya go out. Rocky stands and eyes them all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (impassioned and quietly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll kill ya all... Don't stop nothin' --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BELL RINGS... Apollo moves cautiously out of his corn and circles to Rocky's right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Commentators stare unansweringly at the fighters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fight has slowed down to a near stand-still -- Creed circles to Rocky's right... The spectrum is nearly silent -- Neither fighter has made a motion to throw... I've never seen anything like it in the last round of a championship fight... Apollo spits blood on the canvas.  It appears he is protecting his right side.  His ribs were probably injured at the end of round fourteen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's confirmed, unofficially, Creed's ribs may be broken -- Apollo fakes a left and throws a big tired right -- Balboa's mouthpiece is out!  Creed attacks with one hand!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Apollo feints and Rocky falls for it.  The Champion unlea a lethal blow to the side of the head that jolts Rocky's mouthpiece into the second row... Rocky sags against the ropes in a crucified position... The insane crowd leaps t their feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocky's bloody teeth snarl at Apollo and he waves him to come ahead and fight toe to toe... Apollo obliges with a weary but effective burst of rights and lefts that have K written on every punch.  Rocky counters the assault blow blow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gimme ya best!!!! Mickey looks at the clock... TEN SECONDS TO GO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gimme ya best!!! Blood sprays over the ropes and onto the ringside photographers... They are horrified and wipe away the blo The fighters stand toe to toe and drag every remaining bi of strength from their souls and beat each other without mercy.  They look hypnotized and have entered a dimension far beyond blood and pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BELL RINGS... The arena EXPLODES with thunderous appr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their cornermen rush to their collapsed fighters... In th midst of all the confusion both fighters look at each oth with unabashed respect -- They stand like blood-drenched gladiators on the most dramatic night of their lives. As though reacting to some unspoken command, they both st towards each other and embrace... Apollo whispers in Rock ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Ain't gonna be no rematch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Don't want one. Mickey comes over and separates them and leads him back t his corner... Mickey embraces him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Announcer enters the ring with a microphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Attention, please!!  Attention!! Ladies and gentlemen, tonight we have had the rare privilege to have witnessed the greatest exhibitions of stamina and guts ever in the history of sports. The CROWD ROARS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ladies and gentlemen -- We have a split decision!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Apollo did not expect this and tenses.  His corner nervou tries to reassure him.  It does no good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocky did not expect this either and looks in confusion a Mickey, but Mickey is frozen with anticipation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Judge Walker scores it eight- seven Creed... Judge Roseman scores it eight-seven Balboa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Apollo is rigid.  Fear radiates from his eyes.  To lose t crown on this night after the fight he fought would kill him... A silence has blanketed the arena.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Judge Conners scores it nine- six Creed... Winner and still Heavyweight Champion of the World, Apollo Creed!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocky sorely smiles and looks at the waves of CHEERING fa that circle the ring and reach out towards him... Mickey grabs Rocky's hand and raises it.  The CROWD ROARS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't care what they say, you're a winner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yo, can I have my locker back? Mickey and Rocky look at each other and grin.  Mickey hug Rocky like a son.  Mickey raises Rocky's hand again.  Roc turns away from Mickey and pats Benny the cut-man's shoulder... Benny smiles wearily.  Rocky stares across th ring at Apollo Creed, who stands victorious, but his face and body are badly distorted... The two men lock stares t reflect admiration.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Apollo climbs out of the ring and the fans crush forward screaming his name and waving red, white and blue banners

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocky also climbs out of the ring and waves of frantic we wishing fans rumble forward... Mickey's eyes show mountin apprehension as the fans become abnormally active.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They shove the police aside and clutch wildly at Creed. Creed's army of bodyguards swing angrily at the crowd but they are soon engulfed by screaming waves of humanity. Apollo is suddenly hoisted into the air and is being carr along by a legion of fans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the opposite aisle Rocky is experiencing the same overwhelming adulation by his fans but does not seem to b frightened by it, like Apollo.  Mickey tries his best to control things but his voice is drowned out in the growin clamor.  The fans shove the guards aside and hoist Rocky their shoulders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocky's and Apollo's fans are aggressively competing agai each other... chanting, 'Creed, Creed, Creed.' Rocky's fans counter by bellowing, 'Rocky, Rocky, Rocky.'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Paulie tries to get to Rocky but is shoved aside and he starts swinging.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Both Rocky and Apollo are completely at the mercy of the crowd.  They are being passed overhead and remain helples as their bodies float up the aisle on the sea of hands... The CHANTING IS DEAFENING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fearful that Rocky is in danger, Adrian tries to move forward.  Running headlong into the crowd, she angles through the mass to get to Rocky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She is manhandled and shoved in a multitude of directions but she keeps her feet... She sees him.  In the distance, Rocky floats INTO VIEW and Adrian flattens against the wa and waits for the procession to pass. The procession approaches and she clearly sees Rocky's unbelievably battered but smiling face.  He appears to be king of the world. The procession approaches and passes Adrian.  She jumps o her toes and waves frantically but is not seen.  She scre Rocky's name... Somehow the delicate voice knifes through the racket and reaches Rocky. Rocky frantically looks in all directions and barely mana to see Adrian jumping up and down waving.  The crowd is carrying him away.  He attempts to lower himself but the crowd won't permit it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocky instead turns and begins climbing across people's heads and shoulders.  He resembles a man trying to go up down escalator.  People are jammed so tightly together Ro manages to crawl across them to Adrian. Still suspended in air, Rocky leans down and Adrian jumps and they lock in an embrace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love you -- I love you -- I love you... The two are swept along into the greatest night anyone ca remember...
